title: Public transport for Ladbrokes Cox Plate Gold Cup Night and Cox Plate – Moonee Valley Racecourse: Friday 25 October and Saturday 26 October 2024
articleContent:
Extra public transport services are running from and to the Moonee Valley Racecourse on Friday 25 October 2024. 

Gates open at 5.15pm 

First Race at 6.15pm 

Last race at 9.45pm  

Before you travel

Plan your journey using Journey planner and check Disruptions for service changes that may affect your journey.

Ladbrokes Cox Plate Gold Cup Night: Friday 25 October 2024 

 Metropolitan train

No additional services Metro Trains.

Plan your journey using Journey planner.

 Metropolitan tram

Getting to and from the Moonee Valley Racecourse

Route 59

  • Additional services along Route 59 from 5.00pm to 11.30pm between Moonee Ponds Junction (Stop 32) and Flinders/Elizabeth Street (Stop 1).

Plan your journey using Journey planner.

Ladbrokes Cox Plate: Saturday 26 October 2024

Extra public transport services are running from and to the Moonee Valley Racecourse on Saturday 26 October 2024. 

Gates open at 10.40am 

First Race at 12.10pm 

Last race at 5.50pm  

 Metropolitan train

No additional services Metro Trains.

MVRC will run a FREE shuttle bus service from Moonee Ponds station to the racecourse and return aligning with the below train timetable.  

Forward Moonee Ponds from Flinders Street Station (from Platform 4)  

  • 9.14am to 12.55pm every 20 minutes, arriving at Moonee ponds Station 

Return to Flinders Street (direct) from Moonee Ponds Station  

  • 5.41pm to 8.31pm every 20 minutes departing at Moonee Ponds Station 

Please note: Craigieburn train services operate to / from Flinders Street direct. They will not operate via the Underground Loop. 

Plan your journey using Journey planner.

 Metropolitan tram

Getting to and from the Moonee Valley Racecourse

Route 59

  • Additional services along Route 59 from 10.30pm to 7.30pm from Moonee Ponds Junction (Stop 32) to Flinders/Elizabeth Street (Stop 1).

Please note: Stop 34 – Moonee Ponds Civic Centre – will be CLOSED from 3.30pm to 7.30pm. All passengers are advised to use Stop 33

Plan your journey using Journey planner.
